dict.acceptation: 资源；物力，财力；办法；智谋；

sent.orig: Productive factorial resource consists of field resource, technology resource, financial resource, management resource and human resource.
sent.trans: 要素资源由五个维度构成，即场地资源、科技资源、资金资源、管理资源、人才资源。

sent.orig: Condor provides powerful resource management by match-making resource owners with resource consumers.
sent.trans: 通过在资源拥有者和资源消费者之间创建匹配，Condor提供了强大的资源管理。

sent.orig: Resource-efficient society needs resource-efficient school and which is the groundwork of constructing resource-efficient society.
sent.trans: 节约型社会呼唤节约型学校，节约型学校是建设节约型社会的根基。

sent.orig: Select the resource or resource type that you would like to use for the quorum resource.
sent.trans: 选择您希望仲裁资源使用的资源或资源类型。

sent.orig: Changing traditional mode of "resource-product-pollution discharge" to the new economic mode of "resource-product-reproductive resource "
sent.trans: 变过去传统资源—产品—污染排放的单向流动线性经济为“资源—产品—再生资源”的反馈式经济模式。
